WEATHER_STATION.description: Specifies the weather station for the tariff simulation environment. No default.

STARTTIME.description: Specifies the starting time for the tariff simulation. Recommended to use ISO8601 format. No default (subject to change).

STOPTIME.description: Specifies the ending time for the tariff simulation. Recommended to use ISO8601 format. No default (subject to change).

TIMEZONE.description: Specifies time zone of STARTTIME and STOPTIME. Recommended to use ISO8601 format. No default (subject to change).

MODEL.description: Specifies name of model for tariff simulation. File of the same name must be provided as input.

OUTPUT.description: Specifies name of output file to store results of tariff simulation.

TARIFF_UTILITY.choices: Pacific Gas & Electric Co, San Diego Gas & Electric Co, Southern California Edison Co

TARIFF_NAME.choices: E-TOU-C3, E-7 Residential Time of Use Baseline, E-1, E-7, E-6, DR, EV-TOU-2, TOU-D-B, TOU-D-TEV

TARIFF_REGION.choices: Region R, REGION P, REGION T, REGION Z, MOUTAIN BASELINE REGION, REGION 15

TARIFF_INDEX_SPECIFIC.description: Some tariffs need extra information to simulate. When encountered, provide this field with a corresponding value specified by the error message.
